title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Manufacturing Resource PlanningIntroduction to Manufacturing Resource Planning, Inventory Control, Production Planning, Master Production Scheduling, Material Requirement Planning, Resource Planning, Rough Cut Capacity Planning, Capacity Requirement Planning. Scheduling, Job Shop Scheduling, Set-up dependent scheduling. Flow Shop Scheduling, Special techniques in scheduling. Application of Genetic Algorithm in Scheduling. Introduction to Just-in-Time, Scheduling in JIT
